activities: Our business does not require personal information to produce and sell our products.  Personal data from our customers, such as mailing address and/or credit card information is not maintained within our systems.  We utilize a service provider that processes our credit card transactions under PCI compliant certified procedures.  We destroy hard copies of printed materials that have customer personal data immediately after transmitting the data to our service provider.
eucountries: Austria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Romania, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: any data about an identified or identifiable individual, excluding manually processed data
